org.lcsim.geometry.compact.converter.lcdd

Class HPSTracker2014Base

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.geometry.compact.Subdetector
      • org.lcsim.geometry.compact.converter.lcdd.LCDDSubdetector
        • org.lcsim.geometry.compact.converter.lcdd.HPSTracker2014Base
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Subdetector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HPSTestRunTracker2014, HPSTracker2014

    public abstract class HPSTracker2014Base
extends LCDDSubdetector
    Convert an HPS tracker "2014" to the LCDD format.
